name: 趙莊敏
objective:
對務管理知識作概括性之介紹，並進行財務管理的個案討論。本學期主題包括
1. 財務報表介紹，2. 時間價值，儥券及股票，3. 投資決策與折現分析
4. 風險報酬與資金成本，5. 公司融資政策，6. 財務管理個案討論
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. The Firm and the Financial Manager
3. Agency Problem
4. Financial Markets and Intermediaries
5. Accounting and Finance
6. Time Value of Money
7. Valuing Bonds
8. Valuing Stocks
10. NPV and Other Investment Criteria
11. Discounted Cash-Flow Analysis
12. Project Analysis
13. Risk, Return, and Opportunity cost of Capital
14~18. Case Presentation and Discussions
scorePolicy:
minicase 20%
期中報告 40%
期末報告 40%
materials: Brealey, Myers, and Marcus, ”Fundamentals of Corporate Finance”, 4th ed., 華泰文化事業公司代理。
